Reviews.Title: Nice hardware - liked it overall.
Reviews.Author: Finn Riley
Reviews.Content: This portable had a lot of pros to it and only two personal cons. Kept it for three weeks and installed many configurations of OSes (XP, Windows 7, many Linux distros) on it which all ran well.Pros:Excellent keyboard and touchpad - just liked the feel of both.Nice metallic finish - it showed some prints and smudges but not bad at all.Fast i5 processorQuiet and coolGood fit and finish - felt solidGood priceCons:Not really a con but I could not get used to having the touchpad offset to the left because of the numeric keypad. This seems to be a standard configuration in today's 15" portables so I am shopping for a 14" now.Windows 8 - well, enough has been said about Windows 8 I guess. Easily replaced with alternative OSes but you are *paying* for it after all which may be galling.Average battery life.Summary:Impressive portable, hence the 4 stars. Lenovo has mysteriously sold out of the G480 14" equivalent and is not making a 14" in their new G-series portables (WTF?).

Reviews.Title: Good Laptop for the price but...
Reviews.Author: Rohit Shambhuni
Reviews.Content: I ordered this laptop when it was like $459 and now it has gone up by a whopping $120!! Thanks to Amazon Prime shipping I got my Laptop in 2 days. Okay, here are the pros and cons....PROS:- Amazing sound!!! The first movie I played on it was The Dark Knight Rises and thanks to Hans Zimmer and Dolby Advanced Audio, I could feel goosebumps again. ;)- I like the looks.- Doesn't get hot even after using it for a long time.- Keyboard is pretty good although they could have made the "Enter" key a bit bigger.- One key Recovery is awesome.CONS:- PLASTIC!! The plastic on the laptop is very cheap and whenever I put laptop on my lap, the plastic near the cooling fan, which is very feeble, touches the fan and starts making a sound that'll annoy you. VERY BAD!- There is some problem with the Wireless Adapter Driver software they are shipping with Windows 8 as my laptop would continuously crash showing a Blue Screen Error : BAD_POOL_HEADER. I figured that it was the problem with Wireless Adapter software as it was not compatible with Windows 8. So I installed Windows 7 ( I personally don't like Windows 8) on my laptop and everything has been great since then.So, I would have said BUY THIS LAPTOP, when it was $459 but considering the current price, $579, I would say consider other options before finalizing on this laptop.

Reviews.Title: Shipped at speed-light

Reviews.Content: Good price. Item was received extremely fast. Everything OK. This model is very fast, sports a well finishing and elegant color. Sound is not bad for a laptop.  It comes with Windows 8 installed. (I am not a fan of that system, BTW, I prefer Windows 7 by far)

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for this price point
Reviews.Author: AJ Shah "AJ Shah"
Reviews.Content: This is a great entry level PC. I purchased this as a gift for someone and must say its good over all. I hated win8 from the get go.. and thought it would be a better idea to load it with win7 prior to gifting. Not the Mfg issue, but windows8 is a pain. I am not docking a star for the OS. The start is getting docked due to the trackpad. I have a lenovo t410 and enjoy its track pad. I think they went a little too cheap with the sensitivity/feel/responsiveness on the G8580's track pad. Just wasn't the quality you would expect with the lenovo brand... and yes I know I am comparing a different line of Lenovo, but the track pad is a key area of focus when it comes to laptops.

Reviews.Title: Happy about it.

Reviews.Content: Got this new laptop for mostly web surfing and personal use. So far it's working as expected. I would recommend this laptop to anyone who want value for their money. Go for it.

Reviews.Title: I love my laptop
Reviews.Author: gina4ever
Reviews.Content: I would recommend this laptop for anyone, you can't go wrong for the money. It's super quite and it's not too big to sit on your lap. The only reason why I give it 4 stars is because I don't like Windows 8 .. That takes a while to get use to, and I still have issues with it after months later. The battery life does seem a bit short but it charges up fast. I love how fast it is, it boots fast and loads Internet Explorer fast. I also use a double browser at times, Explorer and Firefox to play some of my games. It's so fast and it has plenty of storage space for pictures and music.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop. I'm very happy with this item.
Reviews.Author: Jonnathan Javier
Reviews.Content: I've had this laptop for over a month and the results can't be better. Great screen, no lag, good speed, one think I'm very happy with its the keyboard excellent. I don't understand why so many bad reviews for Windows 8, it's a change but you just have to adapt. And when you get how to use it it's fine. No need of so many bad reviews. I'm thinking in buy a 4gb more of ram for the laptop, not because it need more memory just because I think that I will increase the life of the laptop.
